ygData.subject: Re: Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I m nowhere near your level, oh to have such decisions, but I d go with claw and drik, especially against casters as you ll disrupt more often and those
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I'm nowhere near your level, oh to have such decisions, but I'd go
with claw and drik, especially against casters as you'll disrupt more often
and those chunks of 7 misses in a row will hurt you less.

Kitasi of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: David Lendrum [mailto:Karnek@...]
Sent: Friday, June 18, 1999 12:56 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Weapons


Decisions aplenty...I am a level 27 bard and I can't figure out which
weapons to use. I have a barbed leather whip, dragoon dirk, demon claws,
polished granite tomahawk, and screaming mace. I know I want to use my claws
just cause they look so cool ; ) but they can only be worn in primary hand
=( I am wondering if I should go for the dmg (barbed whip) or speed (dragoon
dirk)? My 1h blunt is pretty low (27) so in my mind I have probably already
ruled it out, and the PGT's shield skin song hurts more than helps at higher
levels since the first hit the mob gets in when it wears offis for dmg based
on your low agil. Any feedback would be appreciated!
Karnek D'Jester L27 Bard - Erollisi Marr
